name: copilot-plus-plus
description: Enhances GitHub Copilot with AI-powered commit message generation

enumDescriptions: GPT-4o - Most capable model, best for complex understanding
GPT-4o-mini - Faster variant with slightly reduced capabilities
Claude 3.5 Sonnet - Anthropic's model with excellent context understanding
o1 - OpenAI o1 model, highest reasoning capabilities
o1-mini - Smaller, faster OpenAI o1 model
copilotPlusPlus.languageModel.description: The language model to use for generating commit messages

copilotPlusPlus.defaultTargetBranch.description: The default target branch to select for PR description and review. If not set or if the branch doesn't exist, will try to use 'main' or 'master'.

enumDescriptions: Gitmoji style with emojis (e.g. âœ¨ Add new feature)
copilotPlusPlus.commitStyle.description: The style of commit messages to generate

copilotPlusPlus.includeTicketNumber.description: Include ticket numbers from branch names in commit messages

copilotPlusPlus.ticketPattern.description: Regex pattern to extract ticket numbers from branch names

copilotPlusPlus.prDescriptionStyle.description: Style of the PR description generated

copilotPlusPlus.includeTechnicalDetails.description: Include a summary of file changes in the PR description

copilotPlusPlus.groupCommitsByType.description: Group commits by type in the PR description

copilotPlusPlus.prReview.includeSecurity.description: Include security vulnerability checks in PR reviews

copilotPlusPlus.prReview.includeCodeStyl.description: Check code style and best practices during PR reviews

copilotPlusPlus.prReview.includePerforma.description: Analyze code for potential performance issues during PR reviews

copilotPlusPlus.prReview.includeBreaking.description: Check for breaking changes in PR reviews

copilotPlusPlus.prReview.enableInlineLin.description: Enable clickable links to navigate to files with issues

copilotPlusPlus.prReview.severityLevels.description: Severity levels for categorizing issues in PR reviews

copilotPlusPlus.prReview.includeLogicalE.description: Check for logical errors, edge cases, and flawed business logic implementation during PR reviews

copilotPlusPlus.prReview.includeTestingG.description: Identify missing or inadequate test coverage during PR reviews

scripts.compile: pnpm run check-types && pnpm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: pnpm run check-types && pnpm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: pnpm run compile-tests && pnpm run compile && pnpm run lint
